title: Enhancing Leadership Practical Competencies: Instructional Design Strategies for Improving Remote Education Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language learning experience and possession of basic professional field knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three effective interaction strategies for distance education compared to traditional education
Learners can develop and implement self-directed learning plans at 80% or higher proficiency in LMS-based learning environments
Learners can perform expert-level language tasks in asynchronous environments and participate in peer evaluation and feedback at 90% or higher
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
